user.title: SharePoint Photos
user.description: Configure your SharePoint connection to display random photos from your folders.

data_description.tenant_id: Your Azure Active Directory tenant ID (GUID)
data_description.client_id: The application ID from your Azure AD app registration
data_description.client_secret: The client secret generated for your app registration
data_description.site_url: Full URL to your SharePoint site (e.g., https://yourdomain.sharepoint.com/sites/photos)
data_description.library_name: Name of the document library containing your photos. Common values: 'Documents' (English), 'Freigegebene Dokumente' (German), 'Shared Documents'
data_description.base_folder_path: Path to the folder containing your photo folders (e.g., /Photos, /General/Fotos)

error.authentication_failed: Authentication failed. Please check your credentials.
error.site_not_found: SharePoint site not found. Please check the site URL.
error.library_not_found: Document library not found. Please check the library name.
error.folder_not_found: Base folder not found. Please check the folder path.
error.network_error: Network error. Please check your internet connection.
error.unknown: Unknown error occurred. Please check the logs.

abort.single_instance_allowed: Only a single configuration of SharePoint Photos is allowed.
